main event: A brilliant and silver-colored object was observed over Mobile, Alabama, exhibiting no sound, vapor trails, and extreme brightness. It was tracked by radar and witnessed by multiple residents of Alabama and Mississippi, including the control tower operator of Brookley Air Force Base.
interesting points: The object was described as similar to a jet aircraft in color and appeared highly maneuverable.
It was tracked on radar approaching Mobile from the southeast, circling the city, and then disappearing in a northeasterly direction.
The sighting lasted for 62 seconds, and there were multiple witnesses, including a 7 1/2-year-old girl, a control tower operator, and five other residents of Alabama and Mississippi.
There were conflicting descriptions of the UFO, with one report describing it as resembling a balloon at very high altitude, while another report mentioned short stubby wings.
The official conclusion was that there was insufficient data for evaluation, and the information presented conflicted with the analysis.
witnesses: multiple witnesses, including a control tower operator and residents of Alabama and Mississippi
